SatSchool Resources

Lesson-ready resources for Teachers, Students and additional resources with StoryMaps, presentations, lesson plans, and activities

Find our newly updated lesson-ready resouces below. You can find lesson-ready resources for each of the Modules by following the “For Teachers” or “For Students” tabs at the top of the webpage.

Links with the English curriculum can be found here. Scottish curriculum links are coming soon.

Lesson ready resources: For Teachers
 Here you will find resources to help you deliver Earth observation lessons in your classroom.

Lesson ready resources: For Students
 Here you will find all the resources for your Earth Observation lesson!

Additional Resources

Here you will find additional resources developed by SatSchool.

Intro to Earth Observation
 Introduction to the science of Earth observation. Learn about satellites, how they work and how we use them to measure our planet.
Subject links: Physics, Geography

Hands on with Data
 Get hands on with satellite data! Learn how to manipulate and understand data from satellites in a range of contexts.
Subject links: Computer Science, Geography, Maths

Biosphere
 Learn how we use satellite data to measure the living parts of our planet.
Subject links: Geography, Biology, Physics

Cryosphere
 Learn how we use satellite data to measure glaciers and ice sheets.
Subject links: Geography, Physics

Atmosphere
 Learn how we use satellite data to measure the atmosphere around our planet.
Subject links: Chemistry, Geography, Physics

Oceans
 Learn how we use satellite data to measure the oceans.
Subject links: Geography, Biology, Physics
